name: Cyber mission
description:
The Black Eye Galaxy. One of the planets attacked by aliens for the extraction of fossil resources.

The Alliance send a special cyber team to expel the invaders and destroy their military base.

But in fact, not everything is so simple... All the most interesting awaits you in the final!

-Experience polished 2D scrolling shooter! Fly and destroy the invaders and the factory inside the military base.

-Authentic 8-bit presentation with hand-crafted sprites, detailed pixelated aesthetic. Modern touches like layered parallax backgrounds and advanced game design.

- You can play together. Like a real team;
- Dynamic battles;
- The game world has 7 interesting levels;
- Memorable enemies;
- Classic 2D scrolling shooter gameplay;
- Incredible bosses are waiting for you at the end of each level;
- Various weapons;
- Very cool music!
